docs.snippet: Stop reading the news and take up yoga. That's what some therapists in the United States are telling patients stressed out by a nasty presidential campaign in which two unpopular candidates are in a tight race for the most powerful office in the w...
docs.lead_paragraph: Stop reading the news and take up yoga. That's what some therapists in the United States are telling patients stressed out by a nasty presidential campaign in which two unpopular candidates are in a tight race for the most powerful office in the world.

headline.main: Stressed Out by U.S. Election? Tune Out and Assume Downward-Facing Dog Pose

docs.snippet: A senior Democratic lawmaker said Sunday he had "no doubt" that Russia was behind recent hacking attempts targeting state election systems, and urged the Obama administration to publicly blame Moscow for trying to undermine confidence in the Nov. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior Democratic lawmaker said Sunday he had "no doubt" that Russia was behind recent hacking attempts targeting state election systems, and urged the Obama administration to publicly blame Moscow for trying to undermine confidence in the Nov. 8 presidential contest.

headline.main: 'No Doubt' Russia Behind Hacks on U.S. Election System: Senior Democrat
headline.print_headline: 'No Doubt' Russia Behind Hacks on U.S. Election System: Senior Democrat

docs.snippet: The danger of focusing on the differences between men and women is that it assumes all women are the same....
docs.lead_paragraph: The danger of focusing on the differences between men and women is that it assumes all women are the same.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; discussion of differences between men and women often assumes that women are all on same page about issues impacting their gender; New York Times/CBS News poll finds biggest differences between women on political and social issues are between black and white women and between younger and older women.

headline.main: The Monster Sorority of Women Voters
